name: Mayhew Industrial Punch and Chisel Set, Made in USA
description: A nice combination set of larger pin punches used to drive and remove loosened pins and keys, these are true industrial grade tools that are 100 percent Made in the USA. Utilizing alloy steel for strength and durability, and heat treated with a fully automated infra-red controlled process, these tools are then finished with a rust preventative coating for years of exceptional use.100% Made in the United StatesTrue industrial grade tool3-Most common sizes of smaller chiselsAlloy steel for hardness and durabilityMultiple forged tool for additional strengthPrecision ground cutting edgeAutomated, infra-red controlled heat treated tool for quality and performanceRust preventative coating applied to steel for additional protection
